```{r}
query <- "
CREATE TABLE baseball(
	bsbId INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    bsbName VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
    bsbPos VARCHAR(5) NULL,
    bsbClass VARCHAR(10),
    bsbHome VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
    bsbHigh VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
    bsbTransfer VARCHAR(5)
);"
dbExecute(con, query)

```
